content: annie design crochet and green elephant yarn have brought their crafty skills together to bring you the bláithín blaw-heen blanket club and mystery crochet-a-long bláithín is a beautiful irish word meaning flower **description** sign up to receive 6 monthly instalments of exclusive crochet patterns and shades of dk merino wool hand dyed in ireland over the course of the club you will receive 6 colour gradients mixed each month and combined by you along with a semi-solid grey to make a beautifully colourful finished blanket by the end of the year each month you will receive 200g/500m of yarn and 2 flower inspired crochet square motif patterns exclusively designed for the club by carmen of annie design crochet shipping is included **skill level** all patterns will have step by step instructions suitable for all levels treat your self and let s crochet-a-long together http //www anniedesigncrochet com/2018/11/02/blaithin-blanket-club-and-mystery-cal/
